org.nd4j.linalg.jcublas.device.conf

Class DeviceConfiguration

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.nd4j.linalg.jcublas.device.conf.DeviceConfiguration

  • public class DeviceConfiguration
extends java.lang.Object
    Configuration for a device. This includes the memory allocation strategy among other things.
